app_detail: You can enjoy conversations with 3D characters using only a web browser, with microphone or text input and speech synthesis. You can also change the character (VRM), set personality, and adjust the voice.
demo_github: This demo is open source on GitHub. Feel free to modify and adapt!
usage_warning: Please do not intentionally induce discriminatory or violent remarks, or remarks that demean specific individuals. Also, when replacing characters with VRM models, please follow the model's usage conditions.
koeiromap_api_key_issued: API keys are issued by rinna Developers.
siliconcloud_api_key_issued: API keys are issued by SiliconCloud.
api_key_obtain: API keys can be obtained at
api_key_input: . Please enter the obtained API key into the form.
chatgpt_api_note: The ChatGPT API is accessed directly from the browser. Also, API keys and conversation content are not stored on Pixiv's servers.
